transArray.content: The hotel lobby was fully disinfected during the epidemic, and there is a dedicated food delivery robot which is very reassuring and safe. The breakfast in the store is also very good and delicious! The millet porridge cooked by the chef is very delicious. The fruits served are also very fresh! Very satisfied

Dear family, your satisfaction is refreshing because of the spring breeze and Buddha's face. Because of your satisfaction, we have the motivation to make unremitting efforts and make us make more progress.
